dc.title: A Cool Car
dc.description: This is a cool car with blue ground effects.

dc.title: Lamborghini
dc.description: Automobili Lamborghini S.p.A. is an Italian brand and manufacturer of luxury supercars based in SantAgata Bolognese, Italy. The company is owned by the Volkswagen Group through its subsidiary Audi.

dc.title: Mustang
dc.description: The Ford Mustang is an American automobile manufactured by Ford. It was originally based on the platform of the second generation North American Ford Falcon, a compact car.
